survival-supplies.name: Artificial Gill
survival-supplies.description: Extracts oxygen from water allowing the wearer to breathe underwater. Only works on worlds with breathable atmospheres (types 4-9)

survival-supplies.name: Environment Suit
survival-supplies.description: Designed to protect the wearer from extreme cold or heat, the environment suit has a hood, gloves, and boots, but leaves the face exposed in normal operations. A mask or rebreather can be attached, but truly hostile situations call for the heavy-duty hostile environment vacc suit.

survival-supplies.name: Grav Belt
survival-supplies.description: A harness worn across the body, the grav belt is equipped with artificial gravity modules, allowing the Traveller to fly. The internal battery can be operated for a maximum of four hours before recharging. The grav belt allows the wearer to fly at Medium speed.

survival-supplies.name: Grav Belt
survival-supplies.description: A harness worn across the body, the grav belt is equipped with artificial gravity modules, allowing the Traveller to fly. The internal battery can be operated for a maximum of 12 hours before recharging. The grav belt allows the wearer to fly at Medium speed.

survival-supplies.name: Habitat Module
survival-supplies.description: A modular unpressurized quarters for six people, capable of withstanding anything less than hurricane-force winds. Includes survival rations & battery power. Requires 12 man-hours to assemble, and can be attached to other modules to form a base.

survival-supplies.name: Habitat Module
survival-supplies.description: A modular pressurized quarters for six people, capable of withstanding anything less than hurricane-force winds. Includes survival rations & battery power. Includes life-support for six occupants for one week (1000 person/hours). Requires 12 man-hours to assemble, and can be attached to other modules to form a base.

survival-supplies.name: Filter Mask
survival-supplies.description: Filters are breathing masks that strip out harmful elements from the air inhaled by the character, such as dangerous gases or dust particles.

survival-supplies.name: Breather Mask
survival-supplies.description: Combines the filter and respirator into a single package.

survival-supplies.name: Breather Mask
survival-supplies.description: Combines the filter and respirator into a single package. Small enough to fit into the nose, or can even be a lung implant.

survival-supplies.name: Portable Fusion Generator
survival-supplies.description: This is a light-duty portable fusion generator, capable of recharging weapons and other equipment for up to one month of use.

survival-supplies.name: Rescue Bubble
survival-supplies.description: A large (2 meter diameter) plastic bubble. Piezoelectric layers in the bubble wall translate the user's movements into electricity to recharge the bubble's batteries and power its distress beacon, and a small oxygen tank both inflates the bubble and provides two person/hours of life support. A self-repairing plastic seal serves as an emergency airlock. Rescue bubbles are found on both space and sea vessels as emergency lifeboats.

survival-supplies.name: Respirator
survival-supplies.description: This rebreather concentrates inhaled oxygen, allowing a Traveller to breathe on worlds with a thin atmosphere. It takes the form of a face mask or mouthpiece.

survival-supplies.name: Respirator
survival-supplies.description: This rebreather concentrates inhaled oxygen, allowing a Traveller to breathe on worlds with a thin atmosphere. It is small enough to fit into the nose, or can even be a lung implant.

survival-supplies.name: Tent
survival-supplies.description: A basic tent that provides shelter for two people against the weather.

survival-supplies.name: Tent
survival-supplies.description: A basic tent that provides shelter for two people against the weather. Can be pressurized. There is no airlock - the tent is depressurized when opened.
